metadata.Title: CVE-2019-20923 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: A user authorized to perform database queries may trigger denial of service by issuing specially crafted queries, which throw unhandled Javascript exceptions containing types intended to be scoped to the Javascript engine's internals. This issue affects: MongoDB Inc. MongoDB Server v4.0 versions prior to 4.0.7.

criterions.comment: mongodb: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
